channel.title: Oakley Sculpt 6 OX3073 – Men’s Designer Glasses
channel.description: A multi million dollar corporation today, but it started very differently, with one man working from his garage in California with only $300. Now owned by Italian firm, Luxottica, Oakley are now a worldwide designer eyewear manufacturer. Boasting the likes of Vogue in their portfolio, Luxottica have boosted the brand to luxury status. Jim Jannard, [...]
